name: directoryRename
description: Renames given directory. NOTE:Ensure that you have the required permissions to run this function.

params.name: oldPath
params.description: Absolute path of the directory to be renamed. Alternatively, you can specify IP address, for example, `DirectoryRename("//12.3.123.123/c_drive/test");`

params.name: createPath
params.description: Lucee Only. If set to `false`, expects all parent directories to exist. `true` will generate necessary directories.
